title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the Eclipse IDE, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
OB: When I switch perspectives from Java to Resource and then back to Java, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
EB: When I switch perspectives from Java to Resource and then back to Java, the CVS repository view should remain maximized.
SR:
1. Open the Eclipse IDE in the Java perspective.
2. Open the CVS repository view.
3. Double click the title bar of the CVS repository view to maximize it.
4. Switch to the Resource perspective.
5. Switch back to the Java perspective.
6. Verify that the CVS repository view remains maximized.
